monsterDetails.exploreAbilityDescription: - Breaks hidden walls - Cuts through vines
monsterDetails.lightShiftAbilityDescription: When landing a critical hit, heal the whole party by 20% of the damage dealt. Increases critical chance by 7%.
monsterDetails.darkShiftAbilityDescription: Reduces the Mana Cost of all abilities by 25%.

skills.name: Armor Shred
skills.description: Every hit has a 10% chance to apply Armor Break.

skills.name: Attack Plus
skills.description: Improve Attack rating by 1 (Increases Attack by 26)

skills.name: Attack Proc
skills.description: Every attack triggers an additional hit equal to 35% of Attack value.

skills.name: Bleed
skills.description: Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt.

skills.name: Burrow
skills.description: 4 x 40% (160%) physical damage (earth) applies Barrier (Buff) to itself

skills.name: Burrow Lvl 2
skills.description: 4 x 50% (200%) physical damage (earth) applies Barrier (Buff) to itself

skills.name: Burrow Lvl 3
skills.description: 5 x 50% (250%) physical damage (earth) applies Barrier (Buff) to itself

skills.name: Burrow Lvl 4
skills.description: 5 x 65% (325%) physical damage (earth) applies Barrier (Buff) to itself

skills.name: Burrow Lvl 5
skills.description: 6 x 70% (420%) physical damage (earth) applies Barrier (Buff) to itself

skills.name: Carnage
skills.description: 2 x 165% (330%) physical damage (neutral) Hits all enemies - Heal all allies for (500 + 150% Attack)

skills.name: Claws
skills.description: 2 x 100% (200%) physical damage (neutral) Critical Damage +50%

skills.name: Claws Lvl 2
skills.description: 2 x 130% (260%) physical damage (neutral) Critical Damage +50%

skills.name: Claws Lvl 3
skills.description: 3 x 100% (300%) physical damage (neutral) Critical Damage +50%

skills.name: Claws Lvl 4
skills.description: 3 x 130% (390%) physical damage (neutral) Critical Damage +50%

skills.name: Claws Lvl 5
skills.description: 4 x 120% (480%) physical damage (neutral) Critical Damage +50%

skills.name: Crit Chance Plus
skills.description: +5% Critical Chance

skills.name: Crit Damage Plus
skills.description: +15% Critical Damage

skills.name: Critical Defense
skills.description: Reduces damage taken by 10% of own Critical Damage value.

skills.name: Critical Ground
skills.description: Earth attacks have 10% increased Critical Chance.

skills.name: Deep Wounds
skills.description: Aura: Bleed damage on enemies is increased by 40%.

skills.name: Defense Plus
skills.description: Improve Defense rating by 1 (Increases Defense by 36)

skills.name: Defense Proc
skills.description: Every attack triggers an additional hit equal to 50% of Defense value.

skills.name: Defensive Presence
skills.description: At the beginning of your turn, a random Monster in the party gains Barrier (Buff).

skills.name: Double Impact
skills.description: When exploiting an enemy's weakness with an attack, trigger an additional 50% damage hit.

skills.name: Earth Resistance
skills.description: Earth damage reduced by 50%

skills.name: Earthquake
skills.description: 1 x 165% physical damage (earth) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Earthquake Lvl 2
skills.description: 2 x 100% (200%) physical damage (earth) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Earthquake Lvl 3
skills.description: 3 x 85% (255%) physical damage (earth) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Fireclaws
skills.description: 2 x 95% (190%) physical damage (fire) Critical Damage +50%

skills.name: Fireclaws Lvl 2
skills.description: 2 x 120% (240%) physical damage (fire) Critical Damage +50%

skills.name: Fireclaws Lvl 3
skills.description: 3 x 95% (285%) physical damage (fire) Critical Damage +50%

skills.name: Fireclaws Lvl 4
skills.description: 3 x 120% (360%) physical damage (fire) Critical Damage +50%

skills.name: Fireclaws Lvl 5
skills.description: 4 x 110% (440%) physical damage (fire) Critical Damage +50%

skills.name: Gigadrill
skills.description: 6 x 100% (600%) physical damage (neutral) Applies Armor Break (Debuff) applies Might & Barrier (Buffs) to itself

skills.name: Health Plus
skills.description: Improve Health rating by 1 (Increases Health by 332)

skills.name: Health Proc
skills.description: Every attack triggers an additional hit equal to 5% of Max Health.

skills.name: Hibernate
skills.description: If this Monster spends its turn without spending Mana, it regains 25% of its Max Health and gains Barrier (Buff).

skills.name: Impale
skills.description: 4 x 40% (160%) physical damage (earth) Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt

skills.name: Impale Lvl 2
skills.description: 5 x 40% (200%) physical damage (earth) Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt

skills.name: Impale Lvl 3
skills.description: 5 x 55% (275%) physical damage (earth) Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt

skills.name: Impale Lvl 4
skills.description: 6 x 55% (330%) physical damage (earth) Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt

skills.name: Impale Lvl 5
skills.description: 6 x 70% (420%) physical damage (earth) Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt

skills.name: Improved Attack
skills.description: This Monster's basic attack is replaced by Improved Attack: 5 x 75% (375%) physical damage, gain a random Buff.

skills.name: Improved Mana Regeneration
skills.description: +20% Mana Regeneration

skills.name: Lifelink
skills.description: When landing a critical hit, heal the whole party by 20% of the damage dealt. Increases critical chance by 7%.

skills.name: Mana Plus
skills.description: Improve Mana rating by 1 (Increases Mana by 20. Increases Mana Regeneration by 10)

skills.name: Multi Barrier
skills.description: Aura: Barrier (Buff) can be stacked two additional times. Additional stacks are only half as strong.

skills.name: Neutral Affinity
skills.description: Neutral attacks deal 10% increased damage.

skills.name: Potion Mastery
skills.description: Aura: Potion heal effects are increased by 25%.

skills.name: Rampage
skills.description: Aura: Increases the Critical Chance and Critical Damage of Beast Monsters in the party by 10%.

skills.name: Recover
skills.description: Heals 10% of this Monster's Max Health at the start of every turn.

skills.name: Recuperate
skills.description: Critical Hits regenerate 7 Mana.

skills.name: Relentless
skills.description: Reduces the Mana Cost of all abilities by 25%.

skills.name: Revenge
skills.description: Every time this Monster takes a hit, it gains a Charge stack.

skills.name: Shared Barrier
skills.description: Whenever this Monster gains Barrier (Buff), another random Monster in the party also gains Barrier.

skills.name: Shred
skills.description: 1 x 165% physical damage (neutral) Hits all enemies, Critical Damage +50%

skills.name: Shred Lvl 2
skills.description: 2 x 100% (200%) physical damage (neutral) Hits all enemies, Critical Damage +60%

skills.name: Shred Lvl 3
skills.description: 2 x 135% (270%) physical damage (neutral) Hits all enemies, Critical Damage +70%

skills.name: Splatter
skills.description: Aura: When an enemy is knocked out, spread half of their Bleed stacks to the remaining enemies. (rounded up)

skills.name: Taunt
skills.description: When an ally would be attacked, 25% chance to redirect the attack to this Monster. (In PvP, redirecting monster takes 15% increased damage)

skills.name: Tectonic Spikes
skills.description: 3 x 100% (300%) physical damage (earth) Hits all enemies, Critical Hits apply Bleed stacks equal to 20% of the damage dealt

skills.name: Water Weakness
skills.description: Water damage increased by 50%

skills.name: Wonder Potion
skills.description: Aura: Potions also remove 4 Debuffs from the target and add 4 random Buffs. (2 for multi-target Items)
